/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC    -shared -Wl,-soname,libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so -o libSkidSteerDrivePlugin.so CMakeFiles/SkidSteerDrivePlugin.dir/SkidSteerDrivePlugin.cc.o -L/usr/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins -lgazebo_transport -lgazebo_physics -lgazebo_sensors -lgazebo_rendering -lgazebo_sdf_interface -lgazebo_msgs -lgazebo_math -lgazebo_common -lgazebo -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/gazebo-1.8/plugins:
